comments:
On the latest 1.2 code base, open AmortizationS1, 2, or 3 and it will throw a
NPE in the .log file.

Here's the stack trace:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.java.ExpressionVisitor.processRefToImplicitSend(ExpressionVisitor.java:84)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.java.ExpressionVisitor.processRefToMessageSend(ExpressionVisitor.java:104)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.java.ExpressionVisitor.processAMessageSend(ExpressionVisitor.java:211)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.java.ExpressionVisitor.visit(ExpressionVisitor.java:375)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.java.JavaBeanModelBuilder.build(JavaBeanModelBuilder.java:428)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.core.JavaSourceTranslator.reverseParse(JavaSourceTranslator.java:835)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.core.JavaSourceTranslator.decodeDocument(JavaSourceTranslator.java:917)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.core.JavaSourceTranslator.loadModel(JavaSourceTranslator.java:575)
	at
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.editorpart.JavaVisualEditorPart$Setup.run(JavaVisualEditorPart.java:1920)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:76)

Released fixes to ExpressionVisitor. Problem was it was always expecting an
implicit parent if source of a prticular pattern (treeviewer.getTree().setFoo..()).
